member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.App
member.summary: Defines the interaction of this application.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.MainPage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a instance with no parameters.

remarks.para:
This constructor will calls the inner method called InitializeComponent, but this method will automatically iniatilize all controls in this page implicitly, but Roslyn don't know this behavior, so it'll report a
CS8618
compiler warning.

para.i:
To be honest, I suggest the team will append
onto the method InitializeComponent in order to avoid Roslyn making the error wave mark on this method.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.IAppHostBuilder)
member.summary: To configure the current UI project, and creates the base information.

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.ViewModels.MainPageViewModel
member.summary: Indicates the view model that bound with .
